[img]https://i.imgur.com/YySbEPN.png[/img] [b]On Going Games:[/b] - Safe to add to an ongoing game - May cause issues if removed from an existing save
[b]Compatibility[/b] - My mod does not override any core content so should be compatible with any mods that change the medical system.
